message: I propose we divide the money with a 60/40 split in favor of you, Bob. This should provide a good balance between fairness and my share.
I appreciate your offer, but I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is more equitable. It accounts for the fact that I am taking more risk by rejecting your initial offer.
Considering the inflation and the risk involved, I propose an equal split of the money. This ensures fairness for both of us.
